body: I wondered about this a bit. I don't know the size of the state (since cuSPARSE just returns an "opaque handle"). I guess we could have `THCSGeneral.{h.in,c}` files in THCS defining a `THCSState` in addition to the current `THCState` but I don't know if it's worth the added complexity (right now all CUDA resources are centralized in a single object, which is a nice property too). Also if we ever want to use cuSPARSE in THC some day we'll have to merge everything back.
